Самое уродское комьюнити и баланс.CS:GO-помойка для даунов в которой люди с каждой проигранной каткой и взорванной задницей надеются на,то что на следующий день всё будет хорошо и им попадётся  катка с норм тимой,но нет нихуя они просто просирают своё время.Впервые увидели эту игру?Лучше обойдите стороной...

34.5 hrs review - CSGO is a really fun game as long as you don't focus on the toxic players
overal kek 8.5/10

216.4 hrs review - It's fun to group up and meet friends. There are so many aspects to CS I didn't realize that are really cool when I wrote my old review that make the game a lot better. I still agree with my old review though. overall still a kek 9/10 would game again

421.2 hrs review - I've played a lot more CS:GO, and there are so many things I didn't realize were important. At first glance, this game might look like a simple FPS game, but strategy and tactics are just as important if not more important than your actual aiming skills. phenominal game, 9.5/10.

781.8 hrs review - I mean, it's cs. It's like the basic shooter but its still pretty damn fun. Worth a shot. 9/10.

I'm sure I don't have to say now, but CSGO is a great competitive multiplayer experience. Free to play & win makes the game just as enjoyable as there is no stress on having to pay to win.

This game was revolutionary for the eSport industry and continues to strive to this day. A must have for steam users, especially since it's free now.
